summary: Defines a MusicLDM diffusion pipeline that orchestrates pretrained audio autoencoders, UNet denoisers, CLAP text‑audio encoders, tokenizers, and diffusion schedulers to generate music or audio conditioned on textual prompts (and optional audio inputs).
business_intent: Enable AI‑driven music creation for content producers, developers, and entertainment platforms, allowing automated generation of high‑quality audio from natural language descriptions.
